title: Plan a Lunar Mission Trajectory
description: A mission designer needs to plot a fuel-efficient trajectory for a robotic lander traveling from Earth orbit to a specific landing site on the Moon.

tasks.description: Define the mission constraints, including launch window, travel time, and target landing coordinates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all critical mission constraints.

tasks.description: Calculate a free-return trajectory or a low-energy transfer orbit to minimize fuel consumption.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent designs a trajectory that meets all constraints while using the least amount of propellant.

tasks.description: Plan all necessary trajectory correction maneuvers (TCMs) to ensure the spacecraft arrives at the correct location for lunar orbit insertion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules a series of small corrective burns in the mission plan.
